The AI generates an interactive dashboard that summarizes the investigation results including the root cause, potential solutions, and relevant logs and metrics.
Metoro integrates with the user's observability stack without requiring infrastructure or application changes.

Sweep is an AI tool designed to improve software development efficiency.

Kapa.ai aims to improve developer experience.
Developers face difficulties in searching software product documentation.
Current support models waste time responding to easily answered documentation questions.
Kapa.ai employs an AI agent to enhance documentation search.
The solution targets LLM App Engineers as a primary customer.
The introduction highlights the need for reducing technical support requests.
Kapa.ai utilizes a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) stack for developer-focused businesses.
The solution integrates technical documentation into LLM models for user queries.
It features a sophisticated crawling infrastructure for data maintenance and compatibility with LLMs.
Companies like Langchain, Anyscale, and Netlify use Kapa.ai to enhance their support and identify documentation gaps.
